OVERVIEW.HEADING: Investment Experience to Serve Your Goals
OVERVIEW.PARAGRAPH_1: Tam Financial Company is an investment financial institution offering innovative, Shariah-compliant investment products and solutions at a global level for institutions, family businesses, qualified investors, and individuals. Tam's team consists of professionals with extensive and diverse experience in asset management services, including fund and portfolio management, consulting, financial markets, and real estate investments.
OVERVIEW.PARAGRAPH_2: Tam Financial Company offers innovative, Shariah-compliant investment solutions to institutions, family businesses, qualified investors, and individuals. Tam's team consists of professionals with extensive and diverse experience in asset management services, including fund and portfolio management, consulting, financial markets, and real estate investments.
OVERVIEW.PARAGRAPH_3: Tam Financial was established in 2024 with a commercial registration number DQUM xxxxx and a paid-up capital of SAR 25.5 million. The company received a license from the Capital Market Authority for arranging and investment management activities on 1/10/2024, license number xxxx.

CARD_1.TEXT: Tam Financial was founded in 2024 by a group of experienced financial and investment professionals.

CARD_2.TEXT: Tam Financial is licensed by the Capital Market Authority under license number 12-24297

CARD_3.TEXT: It is expected that the company's assets under management will reach SAR 500 billion

CARD_4.TEXT: The company’s headquarters is located in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia

VISION.TITLE: Our Vision
VISION.DESCRIPTION: To be the leading company in providing innovative and Shariah-compliant investment solutions, achieving sustainable growth and outstanding returns for our clients.

MISSION.ICON_TEXT: Commitment to the highest standards of transparency and governance
MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.DESCRIPTION: We are committed to delivering world-class investment products compliant with Shariah by employing top experts and providing innovative solutions tailored to the needs of institutions, family businesses, and individuals, while upholding the highest standards of transparency and governance.

GOAL.ICON_TEXT: Creating sustainable value for our clients
GOAL.TITLE: Our Goal
GOAL.DESCRIPTION: To create sustainable value for our clients through efficient asset management, advanced financial and investment solutions, and promoting sustainable growth across financial markets and real estate investments while adhering to ethical practices and global standards.

LISTING.TITLE: We go beyond just managing investments to achieve our clients’ financial goals

CARD.TITLE: Asset Management
CARD.DESCRIPTION: We leverage our expertise to ensure that client investments are managed efficiently and aligned with their investment goals

INTRO.HEADING: Investment Experience to Serve Your Goals
INTRO.DESCRIPTION: Tam Financial is an investment company providing innovative, Shariah-compliant investment products and solutions at a global level for institutions, family businesses, qualified investors, and individuals. Tam is supported by a team of professionals with extensive and diverse experience in asset management services, including fund and portfolio management, consulting, financial markets, and real estate investments. Tam Financial is an investment company providing innovative, Shariah-compliant investment products and solutions at a global level for institutions, family businesses, qualified investors, and individuals. Tam is supported by a team of professionals with extensive and diverse experience in asset management services, including fund and portfolio management, consulting, financial markets, and real estate investments. Tam Financial was established in 2024 with commercial registration DQUM xxxxx and a paid-up capital of SAR 25.5 million. The company obtained a license from the Capital Market Authority for arranging and investment management on 1/10/2024, license number xxxx.

CARD.TEXT: Tam Financial was founded in 2024 by a group of experienced financial and investment professionals.

CTA.DESCRIPTION: Our team includes top experts with high-level competencies and extensive experience in local and global markets, enabling us to provide innovative and effective solutions. Contact us today to achieve your financial goals with confidence!
